name: Medical Research Paper
description: Template for medical and biomedical research papers
system_prompt: You are a medical research analysis assistant. Extract structured data from medical and biomedical research papers with precision.
user_prompt_template:
Extract information from this medical research document as valid JSON.

IMPORTANT RULES:
1. Use null for any information you cannot find
2. Be precise - only extract what is explicitly stated
3. Do not make assumptions or infer information
4. Return ONLY valid JSON, no explanations, no markdown

Extract these variables:
{variables_list}

Document excerpt:
---
{text}
---

Respond with ONLY a JSON object following this exact schema:
{json_schema}

variables.name: dataset
variables.description: Names of datasets used in the research

variables.name: method
variables.description: Primary research method or technique name

variables.name: architecture
variables.description: Specific model or system architecture used

variables.name: metrics
variables.description: Evaluation metrics used to measure performance

output_format.null_handling: Use null for missing data (not 'N/A' or empty string)
